name: Splat2D
description:
A Mashup of TowerFall ascension and Splatoon. Have more tiles in your color than your enemies when the time runs out.

This is a fast paced 2D arcade platformer for up to four players in local multiplayer (couch multiplayer).

Input: Supports up to four gamepads With left Stick, X and A
Keyboard Input: WASD, LShift, LControl or ARROWS, K, L.

Created within 48 hours @MiniGameJam in Munich 2017-08-26.
